resources.string: No items added.\n\nAdd items either by hand, by scanning QR codes, or by letting the phone detect them on its hotspot.
No data logged.\n\nData is automatically added when there\'s a stable connection to the tracking device on the item.
Add an item by entering its name and the IP address of the tracking device attached to it. The item will be added if the entered IP address is valid.
Add an item by scanning its QR code, which will automatically fill in some information about it. You may still need to provide the tracking device\'s IP address.
Add items by allowing your phone to look through the list of devices connected to its hotspot. Ensure that your mobile hotspot is turned on.
